name: id
type: Type: String (cast from an integer, but not guaranteed to be a number)
description: Description: The ID of the DomainBlock in the database.

name: ip
description: Description: The IP address range that is not allowed to federate.

name: severity
description: Description: The associated policy with this IP block.

name: comment
description: Description: The recorded reason for this IP block.

name: created_at
description: Description: When the IP block was created.

name: expires_at
description: Description: When the IP block will expire.
